message.body: TOMORROW!!!! Just got off work and had a chance to text so OBVIOUSLY looking foreard to your calming presence on a beautiful day off!!!! Let me know if you need anything. LOVE YOU
Yay! I get in around 4 so I'll meet you at your school yes?
Ok! Yay! Can't wait to see your lovely face!

Yep! I'll be in class until 430 but that will be about the time you'd get to school from the station. By the way, it doesn't look like a school and there aren't any signs but it's behind a wrought iron fence, big brick building. Just ring the doorbell!
I think we're going to make dinner with my boyfriend and roomie and head to this crazy show, drinks after etc. dig?
Ok so just got to girard st but now I'm not sure where to go...
Hey! If you don't want to stand under the thing google frankford hall Philadelphia and head there! We can get a beer!
They have a firepit! And ping pong!
